name: pnp-list-formatting-event-registration
title: Event Registration
shortDescription: This sample provides Event registration with different capabilities such us Start and End dates, Category, Attendees, All Day option, Location, Team URL, and favoriting.
longDescription: This sample provides Event registration with different capabilities such us Start and End dates, Category, Attendees, All Day option, Location, Team URL, and favoriting.

references.name: Use view formatting to customize SharePoint
references.description: You can use view formatting to customize how items in SharePoint lists and libraries are displayed. To do this, you construct a JSON object that describes the elements that are displayed when an item is loaded in a view and any styles to be applied to those elements.
